pr_title: Test Hive VIEW with JOIN and subquery

timeline.message: Test Hive VIEW with JOIN and subquery

timeline.bodyText: Why do you remove it? You are using nation table so it should be somehow provisioned. I guess in your case it was provisioned for other test.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: it's provided with a class-level annotation now
replies.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText: It would be nice to have #4510 implemented so we can have coverage as integration test.
timeline.author: kokosing

replies.bodyText: Yes, but this i'd still want to have product tests, as they allow me to cross-check results between Presto and Hive, especially because of subtleties like #5978
replies.author: findepi

timeline.bodyText: same comment as previously, it would be nice to have single test per case
timeline.author: kokosing
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -172,19 +169,24 @@ public void testRichSqlSyntax()
                 "   CASE WHEN n_name = \"BRAZIL\" THEN 'is BRAZIL' WHEN n_name = \"ALGERIA\" THEN 'is ALGERIA' ELSE \"\" END is_something,\n" + // searched CASE, double quote string literals
                 "   COALESCE(IF(n_name LIKE 'A%', NULL, n_name), 'A%') AS coalesced_name, \n" + // coalesce
                 "   round(tan(n_nationkey), 3) AS rounded_tan, \n" + // functions
+                "   o_orderdate AS the_orderdate, \n" +
                 "   `n`.`n_nationkey` + `n_nationkey` + n.n_nationkey + n_nationkey + 10000 - -1 AS arithmetic--some comment without leading space \n" +
-                "FROM `default`.`nation` AS `n`");
+                "FROM `default`.`nation` AS `n` \n" +
+                // join, subquery
+                "LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM orders WHERE o_custkey > 1000) `o` ON `o`.`o_orderkey` = `n`.`n_nationkey` ");

replies.bodyText: You can give it a try. I did not because i strngly believe this would take prohibitively long time
replies.author: findepi
